Phone.name: PHONE1
Phone.description: Test DUI, please refer to Device_Catalog.xml to add device parameters

Equipment.name: IO_CARD
Equipment.description: Input output card used for power management, energy management on I/O ports of the DUT.

Parameter.name: SwitchOnOff
Parameter.description: Number of the relay used to boot or stop the board

Parameter.name: VolumeUp
Parameter.description: Number of the relay used to press DUT volume UP

Parameter.name: VolumeDown
Parameter.description: Number of the relay used to press DUT volume Down
